item.description:
Spring is the perfect time to come to Marblehead to enjoy the picturesque town without the crowds. Bring your friends to the Sitz Afterwork at the Boston Yacht Club situated on Old Marblehead harbor.

Enjoy the beautiful water views as you socialize and munch on complimentary light snacks in the club's comfortable Trophy Room. Weather permitting, sit out on the deck and watch the evening light shimmer over the water as the sun sets.

DIRECTIONS

From Boston-

Follow Rte 1A North thru the Callahan Tunnel past Logan. The BYC is 15 miles north of Logan Airport. Rt. 1A becomes the Lynnway. Where Rt. 1A branches off to the left, bear right and follow the signs to Nahant. At the traffic circle, take the 2nd exit onto Lynn Shore Drive and continue into Swampscott where Lynn Shore Drive becomes Rt. 129 East. Continue on Rt. 129 through Swampscott. It becomes Atlantic Ave. in Marblehead. You will cross Ocean Ave. at a traffic light and continue past Our Lady Star of the Sea Church on your left.

Common Directions-

The 3rd street on the right after passing the Church is Commercial St. Take a right onto Commercial and then the 2nd left onto Gregory St. Take Greogory until you reach a stop sign where Gregory becomes Lee St. Continue straight ahead on Lee until you reach another stop sign (where the house immediately in front of you has a corner taken out of it). Take a sharp right (almost a U-Turn) and proceed into the Boston Yacht Club parking lot.

 

Boston Yacht Club info:

http://www.bostonyc.org/

781-631-3100

 

Parking is available in the club parking lot. You must leave your keys in the car if you park behind another car.If you don't want to leave your keys, you may park on the street, but street parking is often scarce. Carpooling is always a good idea!

 

Questions?

Please contact Judith Schwenk at judithschwenk@verizon.net
item.name: After Work at The Boston Yacht Club, Marblehead
